laws.full_text:
nt: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: n/a
Notice requirement: n/a
Exceptions: Generally banned for psychologists
New Hampshire

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: Banned for employees that earn an hourly rate les
laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to include specific, reasonable limitations, such as: "Employee agrees not to engage in competing activities within a 50-mile radius of New Hampshire for a period of 12 months following termination." This ensures compliance with New Hampshire law, which requires reasonableness in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited. Alternatively, consider removing the non-compete clause entirely and relying on confidentiality and trade secret protection clauses to protect business interests.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
